transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan Ankit ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir namaste.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir main aapko 20 minute mein karu meri ek meeting chal rahi hai.
Customer: Are main nikal raha hun sir aap.
Executive: Achcha chaliye chaliye chaliye sir aap bataiye sham mein kis time ho payegi.
Customer: Are sham mein actually kya mere father in law admit hai to mere ko hospital jana hai.
Executive: Okay okay okay sir chaliye fir main abhi meeting se nikal gaya hun abhi kar deta hun.
Customer: Ek minute dijiye mere ko bas laptop bhi on kar raha hun apna ek minute dijiye ho gayi meri meeting.
Executive: Aapne bacha liya sir.
Customer: Bas ho gayi meri meeting to aa gaya usme.
Customer: Wo mail wala issue abhi bhi aa raha hai na sir wo yahoo wala hamara.
Executive: Sir maine actually kya mobile mein usko kar rakha tha to mobile mein bhi wahi issue aa raha hai aur abhi abhi desktop pe maine login kiya hai.
Customer: Achcha desktop pe chaliye sir aapne number se login kar liya na aapne.
Executive: Number se login kar liya number se login ho gaya lekin wo verification aa hi raha hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji ek minute dijiye.
Customer: Haan uske alawa kuch bhi click nahi ho raha kahin pe bhi.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji.
Executive: A dekhiye sir ek maine link bheja hoga aaya hoga aapke us pe.
Customer: Whatsapp pe aaya hoga.
Executive: Main whatsapp pe bhi dal dunga sir.
Customer: Ek minute dijiye bas mere ko.
Executive: Ek minute message kal parso aaya tha shayad kuch.
Executive: Haan sir aap apna wo bata dijiye chahe to whatsapp number main aapko whatsapp usse bhej deta hun.
Customer: Ek kaam karo na aap usi number pe mere ko message kar do na.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Login wale number pe hi mere ko message kar do na pehle kiya tha shayad aapne.
Executive: Jis pe abhi baat hoti hai.
Customer: Haan isi pe kar do na.
Executive: A sir mere ko na abhi number show nahi hoega aapka ek wo aapka wo concern raise kar rakha tha na to hamare ko india mart ka number show hoega.
Customer: Haan to 98.
Executive: A kya cheez sir 98.
Customer: 292.
Executive: 98292.
Customer: 32.
Executive: Ek minute sir kya 32.
Customer: 723.
Executive: 32723.
Executive: Ya ji sir 98292.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: 32223.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi 9829232723.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Ji sir maine aapko link bheja hai whatsapp pe bhi aap ek baar check kariye.
Customer: Whatsapp pe aaya nahi hai abhi tak to.
Executive: Haan sir whatsapp pe bheja hai maine aapko whatsapp pe bhi bheja hai mail pe bhi bheja hai.
Customer: Achcha mail bhi kiya aapne mail konse pe kiya.
Executive: A sir yahoo wale pe jayega wo abhi primary hai na hamara.
Customer: A to ek minute.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Whatsapp pe aapne 9829232723 lagaya hai na.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Is hi wale number se bheja hoga sir maine aapko dekhiye.
Customer: Nahi dekho.
Customer: Haan isko kaise karna hai mere ko.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Chalo ye message aaya mere paas email aapko sir ji ji ji aapko na wo join karne ke liye mere ko ek baar ya to reply karna padega ya fir aapko mera number save karna padega sir.
Customer: Oh ho aapka number save karna padega kya.
Executive: Wo abhi grey colour ka dikh raha hoga aapko pura wo message.
Customer: Alert alert alert.
Customer: Are jyada kuch nahi aata na.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Are jyada kuch aata nahi hai mere ko.
Executive: Koi issue nahi sir wo bas aap mere ko ya to message pe reply kar do aapko message dikh gaya mera.
Customer: A ye google meet kar do na main theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Hello kiya maine us pe aap bas whatsapp pe reply kar dijiye mere ko wo khul jayega aap to green ho jayega wo message.
Customer: Ab join likha hua aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing login verification issues.

- Customer hasn't received the link on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a link via WhatsApp and email.

- Executive provided guidance on accessing the link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer needs to reply or save number to access link.



Alert (If Any):

Alert

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login, verification, whatsapp, email, link
